attributes.action: Redesign the A1 Junction 64 slip road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This slip road of the A1 into Washington seriously needs to be redesigned time and time again, vehicles are pulling out of the services to rejoin the A1 infront of fast moving traffic exiting the A1, resulting in many near accidents, some of which have the potential to be fatal, so please lets do something about it before its too late for someone!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
